synopsis: Despite their mismatched styles, police officer partners Hubert and Staller rely on teamwork as they investigate murder cases in rural Bavaria.

title: Hier kommt: Lola
synopsis: The daughter of a Brazilian father and German mother, Lola is a little girl who dreams shes a rock star, but mostly dreams of having a best friend.

title: Stadtlandliebe
synopsis: Stressed out in the city, a couple relocates from Berlin to rural Kloppendorf, only to discover that country life isnt exactly what they had hoped.

title: Die Nordsee von oben
synopsis: Using cutting-edge technology, filmmakers soar high above where Germany meets the North Sea, capturing the landscape there in magnificent detail.

title: Kaya Yanar - Made in Germany
synopsis: German-Turkish comedian Kaya Yanar delivers another delightful dose of his distinctive multicultural humor in this standup concert.

title: Hirschen
synopsis: The residents of Hirschen stumble on a creative idea to boost their struggling villages economy after a driver runs into a deer and seeks their help.
countries: Congo, the Democratic Republic of the
South Georgia and the South Sandwich Islands

title: The NSU-Complex
synopsis: For 13 years, the underground neo-Nazi organization NSU eluded German police while planting bombs, robbing banks and killing immigrants at random.

title: Helmut Schmidt -- Lebensfragen
synopsis: This made-for-TV drama charts the life of former West German Chancellor Helmut Schmidt, who led his nation through the turbulent 1970s and early 80s.

title: Hubert und Staller: Die ins Gras beissen
synopsis: While dealing with a stalled car and a stubborn cow, Hubert and Staller make a grim discovery that sets off a bizarre murder investigation.

title: Sketch History
synopsis: With subtly irreverent humor, this series offers a brief history of the world, from the Stone Age to the 1970s and the fall of the Berlin Wall.

title: Geheimnisse des Dritten Reichs
synopsis: This series examines the inner workings of the Nazi regime with interviews of remaining survivors of the Third Reich as well as contemporary experts.

title: Bruno
synopsis: Flamboyantly gay television reporter Bruno stirs up trouble with unsuspecting guests and large crowds through brutally frank interviews.

title: Der Bärenhäuter
synopsis: Penniless Christoffel makes a fiendish bargain: For a boundless supply of cash, he must adopt the filthy life of a bear. But then he falls in love.

title: Schubert In Love
synopsis: The last of his family line, Olaf Schubert doesnt have time for a girlfriend but dutifully searches for one when his father demands offspring.

title: The Cuba Libre Story
synopsis: This documentary series recounts the tumultuous history of Cuba, a nation of foreign conquest, freedom fighters and Cold War political machinations.

title: Frauen, die Geschichte machten
synopsis: Get an in-depth look at the lives and legacies of some of historys most influential women, including Cleopatra, Elizabeth I and Catherine the Great.

title: Busting the Berlin Wall
synopsis: This documentary chronicles some of the most daring and spectacular escape stories at the Berlin Wall, where a wrong move could lead to certain death.

title: Serdar Somuncu - Der Hassprediger liest BILD
synopsis: With no previous preparation, Turkish-German comedian Serdar Somuncu performs a set based entirely on what he sees when opening up a German tabloid.

title: Die Ostsee von oben
synopsis: Aerial photography delivers a breathtaking view of the Baltic Sea and its shorelines from the German-Danish border to the beaches of Poland.

title: Die Toten vom Bodensee
synopsis: A series of cross-border crimes forces German policeman Michael and his Austrian counterpart Hannah to forget their differences and work together.

title: Die Suche nach Hitlers Volk
synopsis: As World War II ends, U.S. Army officer Saul Padover talks with scores of Germans to understand the cultural mind-set that supported the Third Reich.

title: Armans Geheimnis
synopsis: After facing problems at home, a troubled girl seeks peace on a horse farm, where she and other struggling teens stumble upon a fantastical adventure.

title: Die Bülent Ceylan Show
synopsis: Comedian Bülent Ceylan brings his colorful characters, quirky insights and lots of guest stars to this series showcasing his cutting-edge humor.

title: Wir Geiseln der SS
synopsis: This miniseries traces the remarkable story of 139 high-profile SS hostages who turned the tables on their captors in the final days of World War II.

title: PussyTerror TV
synopsis: Rising star Carolin Kebekus and celebrity guests entertain in an irreverent, edgy and topical mix of stand-up, film clips and offbeat musical acts.

title: Der Island-Krimi
synopsis: A successful Reykjavik mystery writer finds herself applying the principles of storytelling to solve real-life murder mysteries.

title: Bulent Ceylan - Ganz schon turbulent
synopsis: Turkish-German comic Bülent Ceylan demonstrates his hilarious versatility in this sold-out show from SAP Arena in his hometown of Mannheim.

title: Wild Australia
synopsis: From kangaroos to koalas to wombats, Australias native animals may be cute but their looks are deceiving due to their wild behaviors and habitats.

title: Make Love
synopsis: Sex therapist Ann-Marlene Henning asks adults young and old about their sex lives, perceptions and fears as she explains good sex can be learned.

title: Plötzlich Türke
synopsis: When his papers are inexplicably declared invalid, a promising musician from Germany goes down a bureaucratic rabbit hole to reapply for citizenship.

title: Der Heilige Krieg
synopsis: This series looks at the historical interplay between Islam and Christianity and how age-old conflicts like the Crusades inform attitudes today.

title: Buddy Ogün: V.I.P. Was Los!
synopsis: Gangsta comic Buddy Ogün and his manager hit the road for a crazy concert tour through Germany, abducting fussy alter-ego Che along the way.

title: Osama Bin Laden: Up Close and Personal
synopsis: Four years after a Navy SEAL team killed Osama Bin Laden in a raid on his compound, his correspondence sheds new light on his mindset and final years.

title: Weltenbrand
synopsis: Carefully restored and colorized archive footage, along with historical reenactments, brings World War I and its deadly consequences to life.

title: Die kulinarischen Abenteuer der Sarah Wiener in Österreich
synopsis: Sarah Wiener returns to Austria to find many changes, including some of the cuisine, and sets out to explore her native land as a virtual stranger.

title: Spirit Berlin
synopsis: Eager to take a step toward discovering his own inner peace, a young acting student explores different types of spirituality in Berlin.

title: Versicherungsvertreter 2  - Mehmet Göker macht weiter
synopsis: On the run from the law in Germany, shifty entrepreneur Mehmet Göker sets up shop in Turkey and wins over a whole new crew of devoted followers.

title: Die Mockridges - Eine Knallerfamilie
synopsis: In this comedy series, a big family of stand-ups, performers and YouTube stars struggle to balance everyday life with the weirdness of show business.

title: Eckart von Hirschhausen - Glück kommt selten allein
synopsis: Dr. Eckart von Hirschhausen, the man known as Germanys funniest doctor, examines the science behind the pursuit and retention of happiness.

title: Geliebte Feinde - Die Deutschen und die Franzosen
synopsis: Explore the intimate but fractious history between Germany and France, from a shared genesis under Charlemagne to the horrors of two world wars.

title: Die kulinarischen Abenteuer der Sarah Wiener in Asien
synopsis: Austrias Sarah Wiener explores the culinary side of Asia, sampling real Japanese sushi, tasting Sichuan peppers and visiting Vietnamese shops.

title: Im Angesicht des Verbrechens
synopsis: Marek, a cop, and Jelena, a prostitute, are both drawn into the fast and furious world of the Russian mafia in Berlin.

title: Das Leben danach
synopsis: A young woman whos still struggling to come to terms with an accident that took place seven years ago channels her grief into anger and destruction.

title: Zum Geburtstag
synopsis: Desperate to be with Anna, Paul tricks Georg into breaking up with her. Now Anna and Paul are married ... but Georg returns with a story to tell.

title: Phoenixsee
synopsis: Two proud families with contrasting histories and values clash against the newly formed and rapidly changing backdrop of Phoenix Lake.

title: Der sechste Sinn der Tiere
synopsis: Researchers work to better understand the natural early warning behaviors of animals as a way to alert humanity to impending natural disasters.

title: Der letzte Cowboy
synopsis: When his management position at a vacuum cleaner manufacturer is jeopardized, a middle-aged man hits the streets to sell 60 units in six weeks.

title: Deichbullen
synopsis: Two mismatched police officers face culture shock and a sinister mystery when theyre transferred from Hamburg to Kollmar on the Elbe.

title: Jürgen - Heute wird gelebt
synopsis: Two loners travel to Poland with a shady organization that matches German men with Eastern European women in hopes of finding true love.
